furniture.name: Milano Sofa
furniture.description: Handcrafted Italian leather sofa with walnut frame and brass accents. Each piece is meticulously crafted by our artisans in Italy, using the finest full-grain leather and sustainable walnut. The contemporary profile is balanced by classic proportions, making it a timeless addition to any luxury space.

furniture.name: Vienna Coffee Table
furniture.description: Exquisite Calacatta marble top coffee table with a sculpted bronze base. The veining in each marble slab is unique, carefully selected from the finest quarries in Italy. The cast bronze base is created using the lost-wax technique by master craftsmen.

furniture.name: Oslo Dining Chair
furniture.description: Scandinavian-inspired dining chair with woven leather seat and solid oak frame. The minimalist design emphasizes clean lines and natural materials, while the hand-woven leather seat creates both comfort and visual interest.

furniture.name: Manhattan Bookshelf
furniture.description: Modular bookshelf system with adjustable shelves and integrated LED lighting. The sophisticated design features hidden cable management, adjustable shelving, and smart lighting that can be controlled via app or voice commands.

furniture.name: Kyoto Side Table
furniture.description: Japanese-inspired side table with intricate woodwork and a hidden compartment. Influenced by traditional Japanese craftsmanship, this piece features hand-cut joinery and the ancient technique of shou sugi ban for the accent details.

furniture.name: Paris Pendant Light
furniture.description: Hand-blown glass pendant with brushed brass fittings. Each pendant is uniquely created by master glassblowers, with subtle variations that make every piece one-of-a-kind. The warm brass hardware complements the luminous glass for a timeless design.
